name: Romilli (alpha demo) (0.03)
description:
A century ago, the Sarymos family was the most powerful noble family in the kingdom of Lunosa, skilled in magic, politics, and combat. Now, the last of the family still sworn to serve them is intent on guiding the Sarymos’ last heir to take to her rightful place...after she's been sealed away for 100 years.

Estimated play time: 25 minutes.

(Made in 2 weeks for Studio Blue’s MZ Game Jam, but dropped out due to the 3 element rule; every non-plugin element is created out of only the base RPG Maker resources & my own work.)
